name: SQUIDS FROM SPACE
description: SQUIDS FROM SPACE is a team-based PvP top-down shooter where humans and the sinister Squid aliens wage war for the future of the Earth!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only) Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only) Processor: Quad Core 64 bit, 3+ GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX770 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
